frontmatter.title: Googlelocator
frontmatter.description: Googlelocator is a plugin that manages google places and maps and markers.

children.value: Search for "New York" to see it in action.
. This component has complex options that are false by default see demo for custom values.
Additionally you have to pass functions to
Map bounds of current map  when searching
Radius for locate and minimum radius for search (search uses location viewport given by google)
Container query for template cloned for maps items
Container query for items container to append items to
Container query for repeat search button
Container query for filter checkbox and radio
Object for format data and filter functions
Default google maps options as follow.
. You can use different queries with different and nested options.
Add additional options on match media query
let self = Xt.get({ name: 'xt-googlelocator', el: document.querySelector('.my-container') })
for all components of the same type, with
Listen to events, for listeners use

let self = Xt.get({ name: 'xt-googlelocator', el: document.querySelector('.my-googlelocator') })
const container = self.container

frontmatter.description: Googlelocator is a plugin that manages google places and maps and markers.

children.value: Search for "New York" to see it in action.
. This component has complex options that are false by default see demo for custom values.
Additionally you have to pass functions to
Map bounds of current map  when searching
Radius for locate and minimum radius for search (search uses location viewport given by google)
Container query for template cloned for maps items
Container query for items container to append items to
Container query for repeat search button
Container query for filter checkbox and radio

Default google maps options as follow.
. You can use different queries with different and nested options.
